botanicals.name: Grapefruit
botanicals.observations: Another day distilling the leftover; to be used for something else

distillation.notes: Run completed over 18 hours using Roberta still with 2 new plates. Foreshots discarded, heads and tails collected to Feints IBC.

gin_runs.notes: Rainforest Gin RF-28. First distillation after winter downtime; new still plates used. Diluted to 42.5% with total 324L water.
gin_runs.raw_log: RF-28 | 09/10/2024 | Roberta 1000L 51% (510 LAL). Botanicals total 9346g (18.3 g/LAL). Foreshots 2L @86%, Heads 13L @83.5%, Hearts 346L @82.3%, Tails 169.7L @75.5%. Diluted to 42.5% with 324L water added across 3 stages. Final 726L batch.

distillation.notes: Roberta still, 18-hour run. Clear heads and tails separation. Hearts collected at 82%. Tails saved for Feints IBC.

gin_runs.notes: Rainforest Gin RF-29, first 2025 run. Excellent citrus balance. Diluted to 42% ABV in two stages with 266L total water.
gin_runs.raw_log: RF-29 | 20/01/2025 | Roberta 1000L 51% (510 LAL). Botanicals total 9346g (18.3 g/LAL). Foreshots 2L @86%, Heads 12L @83%, Hearts 280L @82%, Tails 169.7L @75.5%. Diluted to 42% with 266L water added. Final 546L batch.

botanicals.name: Angelica
botanicals.observations: Half the juniper quantity was ground

notes: 2nd 5750W element tripped; only one 5750W + one 2400W used.
